mil7.5.5:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘nakulassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.5.5:1.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, nakulo uragamupagacchanto bhesajjena kāyaṁ paribhāvetvā uragamupagacchati gahetuṁ;
mil7.5.5:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kodhāghātabahulaṁ kalahaviggahavivādavirodhābhibhūtaṁ lokamupagacchantena mettābhesajjena mānasaṁ anulimpitabbaṁ.
mil7.5.5:1.4: Idaṁ, mahārāja, nakulassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
